attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Make the New Deal for the unemployed more relevant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The New Deal initiative is aimed at giving umemployed people the best chance of getting back into work, through training courses & mandatory 'options'. These currently are failing in almost every respect of what they were designed to do, as people simply go around the ever-repeating cycle.
